sys_element_mapping.value: parent={{Created_1.current}}^short_description=Reports provided to Board^description=opies of any reports, studies, guidance, or memoranda, whether prepared by FINRA personnel or by a third party, that were provided to the Board or a committee of the Board related to FINRA 's ABC and XYZ programs.

parent={{Created_1.current}}^short_description=ABC and XYZ program info^description=All policies, procedures, and guidelines relating to FINRA's ABC and XYZ programs, in effect during the Review Period. This should include, but is not limited to, the following: objectives; correspondence; agreements; modules; training materials and job aids; frequently asked questions; memoranda; questionnaires; and schedules.^=

parent={{Created_1.current}}^short_description=Board Meeting Minutes^description=All minutes of FINRA Board of Governors ("Board") meetings, including any committee meetings thereof both regular and special that discussed ABC or XYZ during the Review Period.

parent={{Created_1.current}}^short_description=Org Chart Information^description=Current organizational charts of all FINRA A and B group ("A&X") units and personnel, as well as of any other units or personnel within FINRA, with responsibilities related to FINRA's ABC and XYZ programs, including the A&X CC unit. Please include any current vacancies and contract personnel. Please also provide a description of any anticipated organization or personnel changes, if any.
